main event: An observation of a bluish light was reported on April 22, 1963, near Albany, Georgia.
interesting points: The sighting involved a single bluish light that was observed for approximately 10 minutes., The source of the observation was a civilian., Previous reports related to this sighting were claimed to be from an unverified source., A military contact indicated that the sighting could not be verified at the time., Investigations suggested that the observing witness was considered probably a reliable observer.
